innhold.avsnitt: If you are the father of the child, you may in some cases be entitled to the lump-sum grant. This may apply:

liste.punkt: for every child you adopt alone
if you assume parental responsibility or if the other parent passes away
when you are awarded parental responsibility
if you have taken care of the child within 56 weeks after the child was born or adopted, with a view to taking over parental responsibility alone
